titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Algeria
Algeria

div.head: Legislation
div.p: There is no legislation governing systematic declassification of documents.

div.head: Location
div.p: National Archives: ALGER GARE, ALGERIA, PO Box: B.P. 61
Possible Physical address update for National Archives: 20 rue Hassan Ben-namane, POB n 38, Brikahadem, Algiers

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers should contact the Ministry of Foreign Affairs to inquire about access to its diplomatic archives. Additionally, pre-independence records can be found at the French Overseas Archives in Aix-en-Provence, France.
